    • Uses of ComplementConstruction in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp

      Classes in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp that implement ComplementConstruction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractComplementConstruction<I extends Automaton,O extends Automaton>
      A ComplementConstruction object is an implementation of a complementation construction that can complement an automaton into another automaton which accepts the complement language.
      class  DeterministicComplementConstruction
      This class provides a complementation construction that can complement a deterministic automaton simply by taking the dual of the acceptance condition.
      Methods in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp that return ComplementConstruction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ComplementConstruction<?,?> ComplementRepository.get(java.lang.String name, Automaton aut)
      Returns the complementation construction with a specified name for complementing a specified automaton.

    • Uses of ComplementConstruction in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.piterman

      Classes in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.piterman that implement ComplementConstruction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PitermanConstruction
      A PitermanComplement object complements an NBW A in stages: Determinizes the input NBW as a DPW P by the Safra-Piterman construction. Complements P as another DPW P' by increasing the parity of every state by 1. Converts P' to an NBW A'.

    • Uses of ComplementConstruction in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.ramsey

    • Uses of ComplementConstruction in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra

      Classes in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra that implement ComplementConstruction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ModifiedSafraConstruction
      This class can complement an NBW by the modified Safra's construction.
      class  SafraConstruction
      A SafraComplement object complements an NBW A in stages: Determinizes the input NBW A as a DRW R by the Safra's construction. Complements R as a DSW S by interpreting the acceptance condition of R as a Streett condition. Converts S to an NBW A'.

    • Uses of ComplementConstruction in org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.schewe

      class  ScheweConstruction
      This class provides a complementation of an NBW through DRW and DSW based on [Sven Schewe: Tighter Bounds for the Determinisation of Büchi Automata.
